data.title: Sega Lindbergh Games
data.meta_description: Sega's first PC-based arcade board, used for their high-end arcade games in the mid-to-late 2000's.
data.text:
Initial D Arcade Stage 5

February 25, 2009

ARC

The fifth installment of the Initial D Arcade Stage series of arcade racing games by Sega, based on the Initial D manga and anime.

The House of the Dead EX

December 17, 2008

ARC

House of the Dead EX is a spin-off of the series and takes more of a comedy approach to the Sega franchise. A light-gun shooter at heart, players will also take part in minigames to progress through this wacky zombie-love story.

2 Spicy

April 2007

ARC

2 Spicy (or Too Spicy) is a light-gun shooter arcade game developed by Sega. It uses a unique foot controller in addition to a standard light gun. It has both a two-player multiplayer and a story mode with cinematics.

Virtua Tennis 3

March 8, 2007

PSP

X360

+ 3 more

PS3

ARC

PC

Virtua Tennis 3 is the third game in the Virtua Tennis franchise developed by Sega, featuring many of today's top professional players.

Initial D Arcade Stage 4

February 21, 2007

ARC

The fourth installment of the Initial D Arcade Stage series of arcade racing games by Sega, based on the Initial D manga and anime. Switching the series to more-powerful PC-based hardware, Arcade Stage 4 is the last game in the series to be released outside of Japan.

Let's Go Jungle!: Lost on the Island of Spice

2006

ARC

Let's Go Jungle!: Lost on the Island of Spice is a light-gun shooter that chronicles the vacation of Ben and Norah, who find themselves attacked by giant bugs!

After Burner Climax

October 19, 2006

ARC

XBGS

+ 3 more

PS3N

IPHN

IPAD

A sequel to the classic After Burner arcade games, After Burner Climax is an arcade game in which players pilot a jet fighter through hectic, enemy-filled set pieces. Seated in a special moving cabinet, gamers use a piloting stick to control their jet of choice from a 3rd person view.

Virtua Fighter 5

November 26, 2005

X360

PS3

+ 4 more

ARC

XBGS

PS3N

PS4

The fifth main installment of Sega-AM2's signature fighting game series, using PC-based arcade hardware to deliver the most advanced graphical capabilities of video games in the mid-to-late 2000's.

The House of the Dead 4

July 2, 2005

ARC

PS3N

This is a sequel to the other House of the Dead games. It generally follows the same play format as them, with only a few additions here and there.

OutRun 2

December 13, 2003

XBOX

ARC

Set in the most beautiful locations in the world, Outrun 2 is an arcade-style racing game that puts you in the driver's seat of eight different Ferrari's.
